result.execSummary:
All charges against John Herman Sorger in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John Herman Sorger is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Herman Sorger

records.addlTxt:
Defendant John Herman Sorger in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant John Herman Sorger in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court granted State's motion for joinder.   Final pretrial proceeded.  State's offer stated on the record.  Defense rejects State's offer.  Case remains in jury trial posture.  Case is adjourned to 6-15-22 at 8:30 am for Jury Trial.
Received and Filed. Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions
Received and Filed. Defense's Motion in Limine
All previous conditions of bail to remain.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant John Herman Sorger not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.  For reasons stated on the record, Court ordes bail reinstated.  Defense counsel request final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bail forfeiture mailed to surety and defendant. ($1,000.00) LW
Defense counsel emailed the Court to schedule a return on warrant.  Defendant is currently in custody at Waukesha County.  Parties notified of new court date by email.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for a status conference.  Defendant does not appear.  Court issed a bench warrant for the defendant's arrest.  Court forfeited $1,000.00 cash bail.

Court ordered no contact with KAW.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant has until 3-8-22 by 5:00 pm to post the bail and be booked and released or to turn himself in to the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office.  Failure to do may result in a  bench warrant.

Defendant John Herman Sorger in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Sara Nicole Volden Sadowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
